text: Mbombela Stadium is a sports stadium in Nelspruit, South Africa. == FIFA World Cup == The stadium hosted four games at the 2010 FIFA World Cup and eight games at the 2013 African Cup of Nations. == Other websites == * Fédération Internationale de Football Association (FIFA) Category:FIFA World Cup stadiums Category:Football stadiums in South Africa Category:Mpumalanga
title: Mbombela Stadium
